questions.question_text:
An administrator needs to manage a vRealize Operations cluster using the Admin UI.
Which two actions are possible? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
According to documentation its B and D - https://docs.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations/8.10/com.vmware.vcom.config.doc/GUID-14A79597-1596-4796-8C16-67B85A75C5C3.html

choices.C: Activating a vRealize Operations native management pack
choices.B: Uploading and installing vRealize Operations PAK files
choices.A: Deploying a new vRealize Operations node OVA
choices.D: Enabling or disabling high availability for the vRealize Operations cluster
choices.E: Configuring a DNS server on the vRealize Operations nodes

questions.question_text: What is used to monitor third-party solutions from vRealize Operations?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Easy one vrops using management packs - B

questions.question_text: What is the correct process to add a custom metric configuration file to a scoreboard widget in a dashboard?

choices.D:
1. Create a metric file in XML format.
2. Set the scoreboard widget Self Provider to On.
3. Create a widget interaction with a receiving widget.
choices.B:
1. Create a metric file in XML format.
2. Set the scoreboard widget Self Provider to Off.
3. Create a widget interaction with a receiving widget.
choices.A:
1. Create a metric file in XML format.
2. Set the scoreboard widget Self Provider to On.
3. Create a widget interaction with a provider widget.
choices.C:
1. Create a metric file in XML format.
2. Set the scoreboard widget Self Provider to Off.
3. Create a widget interaction with a provider widget.

questions.question_text: Which function is unavailable in the vRealize Operations Admin UI?

choices.C: Uploading and installing vRealize Operations PAK files

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A = Viewing alerts, symptoms, and policies is not supported in Admin UI

https://docs.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations/8.10/com.vmware.vcom.core.doc/GUID-14A79597-1596-4796-8C16-67B85A75C5C3.html

questions.question_text:
An administrator wants to enable a custom metric configuration file to a scoreboard widget in a dashboard, but after configuring it, the scoreboard does not show the new metrics at all.
Which scoreboard widget configuration option possibly caused this problem?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
For me D Refresh content set to Off
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Aria-Operations/SaaS/Configuring-Operations/GUID-464C4018-FFD3-4D4A-8D6F-EF70C9572289.html
